amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To More Than One And Less Than All Classes
amendatorysection.catchline: Public funds; all-purpose levy; length of time effective; abandonment.
amendatorysection.para: Should any city of the first class, city of the second class, or village elect to follow the method provided in section 19-1309, such city or village shall be bound by that election during the ensuing fiscal year but may abandon such method in succeeding fiscal years.
